metadata.title: CVE-2022-3316 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Safe Browsing in GoogleChrome prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker to bypass securityfeature via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
